```{r load packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
```

```{r load data}
ca_np <- read_csv(here("data", "ca_np.csv"))
ci_np <- read_excel(here("data", "ci_np.xlsx"))
names(ca_np)
summary(ca_np)
summary(ci_np)
```

```{r graphs}
gg_base <- ggplot(data = ci_np, aes(x = year, y = visitors))
gg_base +
  geom_point()
gg_base +
  geom_col()
gg_base +  
  geom_area()
gg_base + 
  geom_point(
    aes(size = visitors,
        color = visitors),
    alpha = 0.5
  )
gg_base + 
  geom_col(aes(fill = visitors))
```

# Plots with ggplot2

We are going to make plots in R and it's going to be amazing.
